4b09ecc59d5df8d34dc7bef60b378f78ab468c1326139be8654510","dweb:/ipfs/QmdaJF3TgViF7xcT3y1uiUdCe9gvjQ7Z91UnNdCzFFpPRF"]},"project:/contracts/interfaces/IERC6150.sol":{"keccak256":"0x375e8d2b54eac42f7a759b16c2027e7aaca8d411d4b1dae24e740342add427db","license":"CC0-1.0","urls":["bzz-raw://2587ed5a05e54b63ec7e4912cf05e1c4dc5944603ad1a2ddda7b5412a8ec0d74","dweb:/ipfs/QmUAubuTRa2e5rzX11h7ZB1qTmsYnbtTjaCbSNXz6zQZeg"]},"project:/contracts/interfaces/IERC6150AccessControl.sol":{"keccak256":"0x045ccc80612fb7720bf9ebf9276b0adcf0841dd5f8f7bc8986608b33dd792103","license":"CC0-1.0","urls":["bzz-raw://e2056c21e9a0c1409608a255d26800fe2aa19a88b78ee16af734002fccf68d0f","dweb:/ipfs/QmTsfxwM7bAD8esgAKNMnD8B94qPG7FpQGAhU8JdsJXDkV"]}},"version":1}

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

params.parentId: The id of parent token, if it's zero, it means minted `tokenId` is a root token.
params.tokenId: The id of minted token, required to be greater than zero

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

params.account: The specified account to be checked
params.tokenId: The specified token to be checked

returns._0: If the tokenId can be burnt by account, return true; otherwise, return false.

canMintChildren(uint256,address).details: If the `parentId` is zero, check whether account can mint root nodes

params.account: The specified account to be checked
params.parentId: The specified parent token to be checked

returns._0: If the token and account has mint permission, return true; otherwise, return false.

isAdminOf(uint256,address).details: Each token can be set more than one admin. Admin have permission to do something to the token, like mint child token, or burn token, or transfer parentship.

returns._0: If the account has admin permission, return true; otherwise, return false.

params.tokenId: The token want to be checked

returns._0: Return `true` if it is a leaf token; if not, return `false`

params.tokenId: The token want to be checked

returns._0: Return `true` if it is a root token; if not, return `false`

Minted(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when `tokenId` token under `parentId` is minted.

canBurnTokenByAccount(uint256,address).notice: Check whether the specified token can be burnt by specified account

canMintChildren(uint256,address).notice: Check whether the specified parent token and account can mint children tokens

childrenOf(uint256).notice: Get the children tokens of `tokenId` token.

isAdminOf(uint256,address).notice: Check the account whether a admin of `tokenId` token.

isLeaf(uint256).notice: Check the `tokenId` token if it is a leaf token.

isRoot(uint256).notice: Check the `tokenId` token if it is a root token.

parentOf(uint256).notice: Get the parent token of `tokenId` token.
